item.description: There are a number of ways to concatenate a string in C# and other .NET languages. Is there a *best* way?

item.title: Programming to Interfaces or Objects?
item.description: The other day, I was asked to add some functionality to code that regularly instantiates objects as interfaces, and I was wondering what exactly is the point?
